howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.description: A simple and transparent process in 5 steps to become an owner

steps.title: Choose your lot
steps.description: Browse our catalog and select the land that matches your needs and budget.

steps.title: Reserve online
steps.description: Fill out the reservation form and pay a 10% deposit to secure your plot.

steps.title: Sign the contract
steps.description: Validate your reservation contract with a personalized payment schedule.

steps.title: Pay monthly
steps.description: Pay your installments via Orange Money, MTN MoMo, or bank transfer.

steps.title: Receive your title
steps.description: After full payment, receive your deed of transfer and complete land file.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Multiple flexible options for your monthly installments

transparency.title: Our Commitment to Transparency
transparency.description: We are committed to complete transparency regarding our activities and your rights

cards.title: Legal Framework
cards.description: Our activity is an installment land sale, compliant with Cameroonian land law (Ordinance No. 74/1 of July 6, 1974) and the OHADA Uniform Act.

cards.title: Land Titles
cards.description: All our plots are secured with land titles registered with the Land Registry of Cameroon.

cards.title: Clear Contracts
cards.description: Our contracts are written in clear language with all terms, rights, and obligations detailed. No hidden fees.

cards.title: Your Rights
cards.description: Right to visit the land, anticipatory enjoyment after 50% payment, notarized deed of transfer after full payment.

cards.title: Security
cards.description: Your payments are tracked and secure. Receipts issued for each payment. Protection of your personal data guaranteed.

cards.title: What We Are NOT
cards.description: TERRASOCIAL is NOT a bank, microfinance institution, or savings cooperative. We do not collect savings and do not provide credit.
